prompt: An enchanting grove hidden deep within the Mystic Swamp. The scene features towering ancient trees with bioluminescent vines hanging down from their branches, casting a surreal glow. At the center of the grove is a small, crystal clear pond reflecting the light, surrounded by luminous marsh flowers. Ethereal mist swirls gently around, creating an air of mystery and wonder. The whole scene evokes an otherworldly and peaceful atmosphere, with hints of magical secrets waiting to be discovered. Art is dark and vibrant fantasy with eerie lighting and glowing mystical plants.
